title: Image Comprehension
description: How accurately does the model understand the objects, relationships, and context within an image?

title: OCR Accuracy
description: For document analysis, how well does the model perform Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract text, especially from complex layouts?

title: Data Extraction
description: Can the model accurately extract structured data from unstructured visual inputs like invoices, receipts, or charts?

title: Latency
description: Processing images is more computationally intensive than text. Consider the speed requirements for your application.
